alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Houston; Jones; Peach; Twiggs (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 1:13AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Bibb, west central Twiggs, northeastern Peach, northeastern Houston and south central Jones Counties through 145 AM EDT... At 112 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Payne, or over Macon, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Macon, Warner Robins, Centerville, Byron, Payne, Robins AFB, Payne City, Robins Air Force Base, Bullard, Rutland, Huber, Cross Keys, Wesleyan, Skipperton, Arkwright, Elberta, Franklinton, and Middle Georgia Regional Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
